TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit RemoteArgument extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示可跨處理序或應用程式定義域界限傳遞之型別的執行個體。

span.span: Represents an instance of a type that can be passed across process and application domain boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用傳遞引數不等到執行階段決定跨處理序之型別的結構和應用程式定義域界限。Use the structure to pass arguments of types that are not determined until run time across process and application domain boundaries. 目的類似的`VARIANT`在 COM 中的型別The purpose of is similar to that of the `VARIANT` type in COM. 您可以使用傳遞下列類型和值做為遠端的引數：You can use to pass the following types and values as remote arguments: - .. - .. - 內建資料類型。Intrinsic data types. - 包含內建資料型別的元素的陣列。Arrays that contain elements of intrinsic data types. 內建資料類型是基本資料型別 (亦即型別的屬性是`true`) 或， ， ，或。An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the property of the type is `true`) or a , , , or . 提供的每個支援類型的建構函式。 provides constructors for each of the types that it supports. 您也可以使用方法來建立物件。You can also use the methods to create objects. 方法會自動呼叫適當引數類型建構函式。The methods automatically call the appropriate constructor for your argument type. 如果您建立使用預設無參數建構函式，屬性設定為值並屬性設定為值。If you create a using the default parameterless constructor, the property is set to the value and the property is set to the value .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
